summary: Comprehensive test suite for the aiortc WebRTC library, exercising codec implementations, media stream handling, signaling mechanisms, transport protocols (ICE, DTLS, SCTP), RTP/RTCP processing, rate control, jitter buffering, and SDP negotiation to verify correct behavior and edge‑case handling.
business_intent: Provide automated verification that the WebRTC stack functions reliably across audio/video codecs, network transports, and protocol interactions, enabling developers to detect regressions, ensure standards compliance, and maintain high‑quality real‑time communication services.
